title: Futuristic single-page landing redesign (white + single-blue accents with subtle ambient motion)

requirements.summary: Fully redesign the single-page landing layout and all sections while keeping existing anchor IDs and content meaning.
acceptanceCriteria: The site remains a single-page landing experience (no route-based multi-page navigation).
Top navigation links continue to scroll smoothly to the same anchor IDs: #home, #about, #budget, #benefits, #donate.
All existing core sections (Hero, Donation, About, Budget, Benefits, Footer) are still present, but their layout/visual structure is fully redesigned.

file_operations.description: Refactor the landing page into a new futuristic long-scroll layout while preserving the exact section anchor IDs (#home, #about, #budget, #benefits, #donate) and keeping all existing content meaning/details (donation/bank details, contact details, directors list) intact; restructure sections into a modern layout and wire in any newly created section components. Use shadcn-ui surfaces (e.g., Card/Button) for consistent high-end styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a redesigned Hero section component (still renders as <section id="home"> in LandingPage) with a futuristic/professional structure (e.g., improved hierarchy, feature highlights, CTA grouping) while keeping existing hero message meaning and keeping CTA links pointing to existing anchors. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a redesigned Donation section component (still renders as <section id="donate">) that re-lays out the QR + bank transfer details into a more premium card/grid presentation without changing any donation/bank details content. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for surfaces and CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a redesigned About section component (still renders as <section id="about">) with a modern split layout and improved information architecture while preserving existing meaning and bullet content. Use shadcn-ui Card for feature panels. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a redesigned Budget section component (still renders as <section id="budget">) with an updated futuristic layout (e.g., structured breakdown cards + total callout) while preserving all budget values and text meaning. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a redesigned Benefits section component (still renders as <section id="benefits">) with a premium grid and improved micro-interactions while preserving the same benefits content meaning. Use shadcn-ui Card for benefit tiles. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a redesigned Footer section component (no new routes) that keeps existing contact info and any existing footer content meaning, but updates layout/typography to match the new futuristic theme. Use shadcn-ui components if beneficial. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Enforce a white light-mode background and cohesive futuristic/professional styling across the landing page.
acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the main page background renders as white (no tinted page-wide background fill).
Sections that use gradients do not remove the overall white-background feel (gradients must be subtle overlays, not solid tinted section fills).
Typography, spacing, and component styling look cohesive and intentionally 'futuristic/professional' across the entire page.

file_operations.description: Adjust global theme variables and base styles so light mode reads as true white page background and a clean high-end look (ensure body/main background is white), and ensure any gradient usage is subtle overlay rather than solid tinted fills; keep typography/spacing cohesive across the page and avoid page-wide tinted backgrounds.

Update section background treatments to maintain an overall white-background feel (prefer subtle overlays, borders, and shadow depth over large tinted fills) while keeping the page futuristic/professional and readable; ensure all user-facing text remains English.

requirements.summary: Constrain accents to a single consistent blue shade (neutrals + one blue) across all interactive and highlight styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary CTAs, interactive states (hover/focus), and key highlights use one consistent blue shade (no multiple different blues for accents).
No new accent color families (e.g., green/purple/orange) are introduced for decorative emphasis; neutrals + the single blue are used.
Theme tokens in the Tailwind/Shadcn system remain consistent with the single-blue constraint (primary/ring/accent usage does not drift into other hues).

file_operations.description: Rework light-mode (and keep dark-mode coherent) color variables so the design uses neutrals for secondary/muted/accent surfaces and reserves a single consistent blue for primary/ring/links/highlights; remove or neutralize any extra accent hues so the only non-neutral accent family is the single blue.

Update nav link hover/focus/active styles to comply with the single-blue accent constraint (use the same primary blue for emphasis and neutral surfaces for backgrounds), avoiding introducing additional accent hues; keep existing smooth-scroll behavior unchanged. Use shadcn-ui Button styling consistently for the CTA. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Audit all section highlights (icons, borders, rings, key numbers, and CTAs) to ensure they use the same single blue for accents and neutrals for everything else; avoid introducing additional accent color families. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button variants consistently. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add subtle ambient motion and glass/3D-style effects with reduced-motion support.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 2â€“3 distinct ambient motion elements are present (e.g., slowly floating blurred shapes, subtle animated gradient sheen, gentle hover micro-interactions).
Glassmorphism is used intentionally on key surfaces (e.g., nav on scroll, hero/donation card treatments) via translucency + blur, while keeping readability high.
Animations respect accessibility: if the user has reduced-motion enabled, motion effects are reduced/disabled (no continuously moving elements).

file_operations.description: Add/extend lightweight keyframes/animations needed for ambient motion (e.g., slow float, subtle gradient shimmer, gentle pulse) and ensure they can be paired with Tailwind motion-reduce utilities for accessibility.

Add global CSS support for ambient effects and accessibility (e.g., helper classes for glass surfaces and animated gradient sheen, and explicit prefers-reduced-motion overrides to disable continuous animations when reduced-motion is enabled).

Create a lightweight ambient background component that renders subtle floating/blurred shapes and/or a soft animated gradient overlay behind key sections; ensure effects are non-distracting and reduced/disabled under reduced-motion. Wire this component into the landing page (no new routes).

Integrate AmbientBackground and apply glassmorphism/3D-style treatments to key surfaces (e.g., hero overlay panels, donation card styling) and add gentle hover micro-interactions to cards/buttons while maintaining readability and reduced-motion compliance. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button as the base surfaces. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Redesign the sticky top navigation with a futuristic glassmorphism scrolled state while preserving behavior and mobile interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: The nav remains fixed at the top and continues to change style on scroll as it does now (scrolled vs not scrolled state).
The scrolled state uses a futuristic/glass-like style (translucent + blur), consistent with the single-blue accent constraint.
Desktop and mobile menu interactions still work (open/close, smooth scroll to anchors, Donate/Support button scrolls to #donate).

file_operations.description: Update the visual design of the sticky nav to match the new futuristic theme: keep fixed positioning and existing scroll-state behavior, implement a glass-like scrolled state (translucent white + blur + subtle border/shadow) that uses only the single blue for accents; ensure desktop/mobile menus and smooth-scroll interactions remain working. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add or refine shared styles (tokens/classes) to support nav glassmorphism (e.g., translucent surfaces, subtle border/ring treatment) in a way consistent with the white background and single-blue accent constraint.
